info.brief_description: Adventures in diapers and potty training
info.description:
Stories about The Rugrats using their diapers/underwear and failing at potty training.

Rules

Just stay on topic and add detail, don't just add 1 or 2 sentences
Wetting and messing is the focus, don't go crazy with other things.

Notice: After being messaged a request, I've added an All Grown Up option under Tommy's path for those who want to use it. Feel free to add on to it.

Also thank you for 35k chapter views. I didn't know how this would do when creating it. So thanks to those that read or add chapters to this story.
